name: Nordson Corporation
description: Nordson Corporation is a global leader in precision dispensing, test and inspection, and surface treatment technologies. Founded in 1954 and headquartered in Westlake, Ohio, Nordson designs and manufactures equipment that is essential for the production of a wide range of products across various industries, including electronics, medical, packaging, and consumer goods. The company is well-known for its innovative solutions that enable customers to enhance their production processes, improve product quality, and reduce manufacturing costs. Nordson operates through several segments, including Adhesive Dispensing Systems, Advanced Technology Systems, and Industrial Coating Systems. The company has a strong commitment to sustainability and efficiency, continuously striving to develop technologies that minimize waste and energy consumption. With a global presence, Nordson serves customers in more than 35 countries, delivering high-performance solutions tailored to specific industry needs. The company’s dedication to research and development ensures that it remains at the forefront of technology advancements, helping to drive industry standards.
